Metadata.Description: This template deploys the demo CloudFront Distrubtion and dashboard

CodeDownloadUrl.Description: The URL from which the supporting codebase can be downloaded. This codebase is used to deploy the demo dashboard.

DatabaseAdminPassword.Description: The password to be used for the RDS Aurora admin account.

DatabaseAdminUsername.Description: The username to be used for the RDS Aurora admin account.

DemoDashboardUserEmail.Description: The email address you'll use to log into the dashboard. This is required if "Deploy Demo Dashboard" is set to "Yes".

DeployDemoDashboard.Description: Would you like a demo application deployed along side this solution that will allow you to test the failover? INFO: Because of WAF service requirements, demo WAF and CloudFront resources will be deployed to us-east-1, regardless of which region you deploy this stack to.

GitHubGhSessionValue.Description: The value of your GitHub "_gh_sess" cookie. This parameter will be removed when the solution's GitHub repo is made public.

GitHubUserSessionValue.Description: The value of your GitHub "user_session" cookie. This parameter will be removed when the solution's GitHub repo is made public.

PrivateSubnetZoneACidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your primary private subnet.

PrivateSubnetZoneBCidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your failover private subnet.

PublicSubnetZoneACidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your primary public subnet.

PublicSubnetZoneBCidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your failover public subnet.

VpcCidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your VPC.

rules_to_suppress.reason: This function run once to set up the environment, and is invoked before the VPC is provisioned.
These logs do not contain sensitive data.
This function is used to support the demo environment and does not require provisioned concurrency.

Properties.Description: Downloads dashboard code from a remote repo and deploys it to Amazon S3

rules_to_suppress.reason: This log group supports an ephemeral demo environment and does not contain sensitive data.
